divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside on my deck looking at the stars when I observed an object flying across the sky. At first I thought that it was an airplane, but I didn't see any flashing lights. At the time it also criss crossed in front of a commercial airliner and also passed in front of another commercial airliner in a regular flight path. I see many, many planes eveyday and night coming and going to and from the airport here. Many of these planes pass directly above my house. This light was not an airplane, as it had no blinking lights and made no noise. I observed it cross the sky for about 10 to 12 minutes...
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Sparks
There were no other sightings in Sparks on or around August 3rd 2007
